import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../css/CreateQuizPage.css"; export default function CreateQuiz() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ quizName: "", quizURL: "", startDate: "", startTime: "", endDate: "", endTime: "", timeZone: "", quizMode: "", description: "", rules: "", }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(formData); alert("Quiz Created!"); }; return (
